title: Drawing, 1853 or 1857
markings: Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at left: ... [?] bamboos; and again, at bottom left: weeds in running water / 2 rich green on surface rest / fades into brown grey [see curatorial remarks]
description: Horizontal view containing two stalks of bamboo [?] at left with a group of palms and bushes at right, and leaves and weeds in running water at bottom left [?]. [see curatorial remarks]

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1853 or 1857.
1853 or 1857. Graphite on greenish-gray paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-856.
